title: Ping Spike High Now
body:
My ping in game is higher than usual and I can tell its not just a one time thing because its stability point is higher than before. 
 
My  old ping was 107 on a good day to 113 on the usual maybe 114 if i'm unlucky. 

Now it is 128 and the ping is noticeably higher. Sometimes it goes to 124 but mostly 128-133

Did something new happen with the servers? I really dont wanna switch to oceania, I play in hawaii thats why.





Edit: I tried flush DNS and idk what happened didnt test right after, I updated my drivers thing where it says in the troubleshooting thing, and I woke up the next morning and my ping was stuck at 108! So I guess it's pretty good now, so please try this and see what happens. Then again it could still be a problem on their servers.

replies.body: same shit happened today also for me my ping was at like 66 yesterday now its in the 80s and its bugging me
Same, Do you guys live in the Pacific region?
I do and im having the same problem
im in california rn and damn ive been looking for a fix all day and it seems like other ppl are having this problem also i hope riot can jump on  this because in every other game my ping is fine
It was hard enough when Hawaii players got shafted by the server move. I hope this is only temporary.

It looks like we might have had a small hiccup with the OCE servers earlier on, but so far the NA servers are still looking pretty good for the time being! Double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just in case a setting was reset somehow, but definitely let me know if that doesn't help too much!
Also from Hawaii and can confirm a increase of 20 ping since the new patch.  Use to sit around 108 to 110 and now its around 126 to 130.
did all troubleshooting and nothing helped still laggy with 80 ping
Yo tell me when you find a fix if you do
I also live in hawaii, have this same problem
Like the lag just got worse all of a sudden or something right
